backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding‑related fixes, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries for major frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining light/dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, branding title, and a styled boot fallback loader screen.
frontend/public/health.html: Standalone health check page showing app status and environment details with styled layout.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing themes, Web3, error boundary, and rendering the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: UI component showing BNB and token balances with refresh, valuations, caching, and live update controls.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays contract address, owner, and network info with copy-to-clipboard and BscScan link, using vault info hook.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Provides token deposit UI with validation, network checks, vault balance display, and transaction history integration.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build details and allows copying diagnostics and performance check data for debugging.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches rendering errors and displays a recovery screen with reload option and optional technical details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders app footer with branding, build version, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header showing branding and a theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Reusable token selector enabling dropdown selection or manual address entry with validation support.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: UI component displaying deposit and withdrawal history with status icons, hash/address shortening, and ability to clear stored history.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Handles wallet connection flow with MetaMask checks, network switching, and mobile/desktop fallback instructions.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form for withdrawing BNB or tokens, validating inputs, submitting transactions, and recording entries in transaction history.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends Window type to include Ethereum provider fields used by MetaMask.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous IC actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices and computes USD/BNB valuations for balances with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and managing AuthClient state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating Web3 is used instead of IC queries.
Manages a persistent token catalog in localStorage, allowing label setting, removal, retrieval, and dropdown option generation using normalized addresses.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata (symbol, decimals, name) in localStorage with versioning, providing get/set/clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores and updates transaction history with localStorage persistence and polling for receipt status via provider or RPC.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and tracks vault BNB and ERC-20 balances with metadata caching, polling, error handling, and formatted output.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Fetches and exposes the vault owner address using contract calls with loading and error state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal operations for tokens and BNB, handling approvals and transaction execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a normalized list of watched token addresses with validation and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: React Web3 context providing wallet connection, chain switching, contract calls, and MetaMask/mobile detection for BSC.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes, accessibility rules, and mobile touch utilities.
frontend/src/lib/appBranding.ts: Centralized branding constants and helpers for app name, identifier, and tagline.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exposes static build metadata and utilities to retrieve version, date, and deployed build ID.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Defines contract addresses, function signatures, and helpers for encoding and decoding EVM contract calls.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Provides BigInt‑based EVM encoding/decoding utilities for addresses, uint256, and unit formatting.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Decodes ABI‑encoded ERC‑20 string metadata such as symbol and name using browser‑safe UTF‑8 parsing.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Collects build and performance timing data and formats it for diagnostics or clipboard export.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Utility for fetching BNB and known token prices from CoinGecko and formatting price values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a helper function to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page handling wallet connection, network checks, balance display, and deposit/withdraw operations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking features, issues, and naming regression related to app identifiers.
